meanings.definition: The quality of being ostentatious or showy.
meanings.sent1: Her ostentatiousnesses in dressing always attracted attention.
meanings.sent2: The ostentatiousnesses of the mansion was evident in its gold-plated fixtures.
meanings.sent3: Despite her ostentatiousnesses, she was actually quite humble.
meanings.sent4: The ostentatiousnesses of his car reflected his desire for status.
meanings.sent5: The ostentatiousnesses of the party left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: The act of displaying wealth or success in a flashy manner.
meanings.sent1: His ostentatiousnesses at the charity event raised eyebrows.
meanings.sent2: The ostentatiousnesses of her jewelry collection was unmatched.
meanings.sent3: The ostentatiousnesses of his spending habits were legendary among his friends.
meanings.sent4: Her ostentatiousnesses in business meetings often led to successful deals.
meanings.sent5: The ostentatiousnesses of the CEO's office reflected the company's prosperity.
